    • Constructor Detail

      • DeltaTauComm

        public DeltaTauComm(java.lang.String hostname)
        Constructor with user-provied hostname and default username and password (defaults from the manufacturer)
        Parameters:
        hostname -

      • DeltaTauComm

        public DeltaTauComm(java.lang.String hostname,
            java.lang.String username,
            java.lang.String password)
        Constructor with user-provided hostname, username, and password. Initializes `com.jcraft.jsch.Session`, creates a shell `Channel` within the `Session`, writes the `gpascii -2` command to the `OutputBuffer` of the `Channel` and then reads the `InputBuffer` of the `Channel` until it receives the "STDIN Open for ASCII input" response and then issues the “echo 15” command to configure the text interpreter to provide “short” answers. After completion, the Power PMAC is ready for ASCII commands.
        Parameters:
        hostname -
        username -
        password -
        See Also:
        gpasciiQuery(String), gpasciiCommand(String)

    • Method Detail

      • gpasciiQuery

        public java.lang.String gpasciiQuery(java.lang.String command)
        Sends provided query command to the gpascii program and returns the response. Waits until the InputStream of the channel (data received from attached server) receives the expected response. Parses the response to returns the answer String.
        Parameters:
        command - a query command, e.g., "DestCS2X"
        Returns:
        the response formatted as a string
        See Also:
        readChannelToAcknowledgement(Channel), stringifyQueryResponse(byte[])

      • gpasciiCommand

        public void gpasciiCommand(java.lang.String command)
        Sends provided command to the gpascii program. Waits until the InputStream of the channel (data received from attached server) receives the expected response.
        Parameters:
        command - a query or "set" command, e.g. "DestCS1X=200.5". query commands always contain an equal sign.
        See Also:
        readChannelToAcknowledgement(Channel)

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the shell channel and the SSH session
